Sentencas: The performance and the operation viability of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) fueled by reformed methane using the concept of non-uniform potential operation were evaluated by one-dimensional finite difference analysis.
Titulo: Evaluation of performance and operation viability of non-uniform potential solid oxide fuel cell fueled by reformed methane

Sentencas: Two thermal constraints including maximum acceptable stack temperature gradient and maximum stack temperature were the criteria for considering the operation viability.
Titulo: Evaluation of performance and operation viability of non-uniform potential solid oxide fuel cell fueled by reformed methane

Sentencas: The average power density was used as a performance indicator.
Titulo: Evaluation of performance and operation viability of non-uniform potential solid oxide fuel cell fueled by reformed methane

Sentencas: In addition, two major process parameters: fuel and air inlet temperatures and the operating voltage were examined to determine the suitable values for different viabilities.
Titulo: Evaluation of performance and operation viability of non-uniform potential solid oxide fuel cell fueled by reformed methane

Sentencas: The results revealed that non-uniform potential SOFC with two stack sections operating at different voltages could not offer a significantly higher average power density compared with the uniform potential SOFC owing to thermal constraint limitations.
Titulo: Evaluation of performance and operation viability of non-uniform potential solid oxide fuel cell fueled by reformed methane

Sentencas: The installation of coolers between the stacks is important and it could offer 12.8% improvement in average power density.
Titulo: Evaluation of performance and operation viability of non-uniform potential solid oxide fuel cell fueled by reformed methane
Evaluation of performance and operation viability of non-uniform potential solid oxide fuel cell fueled by reformed methane
